TopicTitle: Mk 3 cargo bays have no textures; help!

Articles.Content: See the above: my new Mk 3 cargo bays have a completely blank white texture. Verified the game cache; no dice. Help?

Please follow the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide. We need good information to help.

If you're on Linux, you can try installing libsdl-image11.2.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Master Tao
Yeah. windows 32bit stock install. Mk-3 cargo bays have no textures.

See the above: my new Mk 3 cargo bays have a completely blank white texture. Verified the game cache; no dice. Help?

I'm having the same problem.

Here's a screenshot:

Edited December 16, 2014 by choninja21

I would suggest trying the database reload from the alt-f12 debug menu, but you haven't given us much information to work on.

The stickies ( http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92228-Known-Issues-Self-Help , http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide ) are an important place to look.

I have the exact same problem, but on Linux.

Since you mentioned, I have libSDL_image-1.2.so.0.8.4 installed (it's the default SDL image library on ArchLinux, lib version 1.2.12-3).

The requested info is here: https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B8TMGw8Zhm5PUU11eXhzZk9Xb1k&usp=sharing

If you need more info, just ask.

EDIT: Steam install, run from command line.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Bolche

Yes, there can be separate fixes depending on your Operating System and your type of KSP install.

Please make sure you are specifying if using Steam or the KSP store. Also, if you can upload log files that will help us get to the root of the problem faster (As Supernovy pointed out).

Cheers,

~Claw
I can confirm that the database reload from the Debug Menu solved the issue for me.
Am I the only one having an issue where the Mk3 spaceplane parts in 0.90 have no texture, and are flush white?
I've this happen to me a few times, try reloading it or switching to another vessel.
I've had this, and I've seen it in the showcase videos as well.

Mine have texture

The Mk3 IVA view is just black for me though

Am I the only one having an issue where the Mk3 spaceplane parts in 0.90 have no texture, and are flush white?

It's a known issue, and apparently there are already some known fixes. I've taken the liberty of merging your thread with the existing one in the Support subforum Don't forget to follow the steps in the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide for the best advice for your particular install.

Edited December 16, 2014 by Specialist290

I would suggest trying the database reload from the alt-f12 debug menu

+1 - I ran into this missing textures issue today with the mk3 adapter parts. The database reload fixed it for me.

Reloading the database was only a temporary fix required for every game load. It also interacted poorly with the KAS mod. I was able to correctly fix this problem by "Verifying integrity of game cache" in the Steam game properties.

Reloading the database was only a temporary fix required for every game load. It also interacted poorly with the KAS mod. I was able to correctly fix this problem by "Verifying integrity of game cache" in the Steam game properties.

http://i.imgur.com/tkrXrBn.png

I did this 3 times and i still have the white texture?
